tooltips.privateNewLsps: If 'true', LSPs that are created by the tool are marked as Private.
tooltips.lspTraffic: Method to determine associated BW with each SR policy when optimization is performed.
tooltips.debugOpt: If 'true', save debug plan files to filesystem.
tooltips.priorityMode: Run BWOD in priority-mode.  Required if Bandwidth Optimization function pack is running in parallel.
tooltips.modelUpdateThrottle: Time in seconds to wait between updates.  Set to 0 to disable.  Range: 0 - 4294967295.
tooltips.reoptInterval: Time in seconds before policies are available to be re-optimized since last path change.  Range: 0 - 4294967295
tooltips.utilThreshold: Interfaces whose utilization exceeds this threshold should be optimized.  Range: 0.0 - 100.0.
tooltips.metricReoptInterval: Time in seconds before policies are re-optimized for metric.  Range: 0 - 4294967295
tooltips.enable: Enables the Bandwidth On Demand function pack.
tooltips.optTimeLimit: Maximum allowed run time for the BWoD optimizer.
tooltips.pceDispatchTimeout: Time in seconds to wait for a response from pce-dispatcher.   Range: 1 - 300.
tooltips.allowedPolicyViolations: Determines how BWoD acts when new policies are provisioned and policy violations are detected.
tooltips.optTimeEventThreshold: If the optimizer runs longer than this value in seconds, send an event to the UI. Range 0 - 4294967295
tooltips.debugOptMaxFiles: The number of debug plan files to save.  Range: 0 - 1024.

tooltips.color: BWopt will assign color values to tactical SR policies incrementally starting at this value. [0, 4294967295]
tooltips.debugOpt: Save debug plan files to filesystem
tooltips.utilHoldMargin: Interface utilization must be this amount below Utilization Threshold without a tactical SR policy to remove it from network. Dampens removals. [0, Utilization Threshold]
tooltips.maxGlobalReoptInterval: Existing tactical SR policies are globally re-optimized at least this often (minutes). 0 means off. [0, 4294967295]
tooltips.removalSuspensionInterval: The minimum duration in seconds after any tactical SR policy change before any existing tactical SR policies are again eligible for removal. [0, 4294967295]
tooltips.congestionCheckSuspensionInterval: The minimum duration in seconds after any tactical SR policy addition/deletion to suspend congestion detection/mitigation to allow model convergence. [0, 4294967295]
tooltips.delLsps: Delete all deployed tactical SR policies when BWOpt is disabled.
tooltips.objective: Path computation objective used for tactical SR policies
tooltips.utilThreshold: The percent utilization at which BWOpt will consider an interface to be congested. [0, 100]
tooltips.profileId: Profile-ID to assign all tactical SR policies. Should be mapped to autoroute feature on PCCs. 0 means unset. [0, 65535]
tooltips.pceDispatchTimeout: Max time in seconds to allow deployment of tactical SR policies to be confirmed [10, 300]
tooltips.fixLspDuration: The minimum duration in seconds before a new tactical SR policy can be modified or removed. [0, 4294967295]
tooltips.maxSplits: Max number of tactical policies with same source and destination. [1, 8]
tooltips.debugOptMaxFiles: The max number of debug plan file sets to save. 0 means no max. [0, 1024]

tooltips.color: BWopt will assign color values to tactical SR policies incrementally starting at this value. [0, 4294967295]
